name: daydream bbs
body:
## Welcome to the hosted space for DayDream BBS.

## Current version: 2.20.0-RC

There is a code freeze in the works. There will only be slight bug fixes to
the current version. The roadmap for the future involves a significant re-
write to the software, changing the backend database and frontend API.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Installation instructions:

`git clone https://github.com/ryanfantus/daydream.git`

(These are admittedly pretty sparse! It's a work in progress!)

move into daydream-2.20.0 directory
as root, 

`sh install.sh`

check out docs/ directory for specifics regarding inetd, xinetd, etc

That's it! Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
